SEARCH
Package StudentManagement.services

Class EnrollmentManager

java.lang.Object
StudentManagement.services.EnrollmentManager
public class EnrollmentManager extends Object
EnrollmentManager class to manage student and course enrollments. This class provides methods to add students and courses, enroll students in courses,

    • EnrollmentManager

      public EnrollmentManager()

  • Method Details

    • InitilizeEnroller

      public void InitilizeEnroller()
      Method to initialize the enrollment manager. This method sets up the enrollment matrix to false, indicating no enrollments initially.

    • getStudentCount

      public int getStudentCount()
      Get the count of students.
      Returns:
      The number of students enrolled.

    • getCourseCount

      public int getCourseCount()
      Get the count of courses.
      Returns:
      The number of courses available.

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(String id, String name)
      Add a new student to the system.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the student.
      name - The name of the student.

    • addCourse

      public void addCourse(String code, String title)
      Add a new course to the system.
      Parameters:
      code - The unique code for the course.
      title - The title of the course.

    • enrollStudentToCourse

      public void enrollStudentToCourse()
      Enroll a student to a course. This method allows a student to be enrolled in a specific course. It checks if there are available students and courses before proceeding.

    • listStudents

      public void listStudents()
      List all students. This method prints the details of all enrolled students.

    • listCourses

      public void listCourses()
      List all courses. This method prints the details of all available courses.

    • listEnrollments

      public void listEnrollments()
      List all enrollments. This method prints the courses each student is enrolled in.

    • searchStudentById

      public void searchStudentById(String id)
      Search for a student by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the student to search for.

    • searchCourseByCode

      public void searchCourseByCode(String code)
      Search for a course by code.
      Parameters:
      code - The unique code of the course to search for.

    • sortStudentsByName

      public void sortStudentsByName(int count)
      Sort students by name using bubble sort.
      Parameters:
      count - The number of students to sort.
